parsed.internal_thinking: I am player 'A' in the first round of setup. My goal is to place my first settlement on a node that provides good resource diversity and high probability numbers. I evaluated several nodes connected to three hexes, prioritizing those with no desert. Node 20 (W11, B6, S8) offers Wood, Brick, and Sheep with numbers 11, 6, and 8, giving it a high total pip count and a strong foundation for building roads and settlements early in the game. This resource combination is excellent for initial expansion. I will aim to secure Wheat and Ore with my second settlement. [Response was too brief]
